history.proof: intros s a p d H1 H2. unfold union_mpl_0. destruct s. - auto. - destruct (N.eqb a0 a) eqn:E. + shelve. + shelve. - shelve.

ctx: intros s a p d H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H1 as [H1s H1t].

ctx: intros s a p d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros s a p d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a0 : ad p0 : prec_list a : ad p : prec_list d : preDTA H1 : state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d H2 : state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a0 p0) d E : (a0 =? a)%N = false Unable to unify "state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d" with "state_ref_ok (if (a =? a0)%N then M1 prec_list a (union_pl p p0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) (M1 prec_list a0 p0)) d".

ctx: intros s a p d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a0 : ad p0 : prec_list a : ad p : prec_list d : preDTA H1 : state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d H2 : state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a0 p0) d E : (a0 =? a)%N = false Unable to unify "state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a0 p0) d" with "state_ref_ok (if (a =? a0)%N then M1 prec_list a (union_pl p p0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) (M1 prec_list a0 p0)) d".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M1 prec_list a p) d -> state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok (union_mpl_0 a p s) d

Premises:
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
union_mpl_0 = fix union_mpl_0 (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M1 prec_list c pl | @M1 _ c0 pl0 => if (c =? c0)%N then M1 prec_list c (union_pl pl pl0) else MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match c with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 0%N pl s0) s1 | N.pos (p'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list s0 (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s1) | N.pos (p'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (union_mpl_0 (N.pos p') pl s0) s1 | 
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
state_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok_check s d = true -> state_ref_ok s d
state_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok s d -> state_ref_ok_check s d = true
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
union_mpl_correct_wrt_sign_invar_0 : forall (s : state) (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M1 prec_list a p) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (union_mpl_0 a p s) sigma pa
union_s1d : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl)
union_s_rpl : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
prec_list_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true
prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true -> prec_list_ref_ok p d
union_s0d : forall (s : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl)
union_s_prd1 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
union_s_rpl_def = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) s -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl s) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \/ state_reconnait d s (app c tl) : state -> Prop
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
union_s_prd0 = fun s : state => forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) s -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl s) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
u_conv_1_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p)
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_1_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
union_s1d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> a <> c -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
mpl_compat_8 : forall (s : state) (a c : ad) (pl l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> a <> c -> MapGet prec_list (union_mpl_0 a pl s) c = Some l
union_s0d_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M0 prec_list) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M0 prec_list)) (app c tl)
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
union_s0d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c0 : ad) (pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c0 pl0) -> c <> c0 -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c0 pl0)) (app c tl)
pre_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop
union_s0d_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) (app 1%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 1%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 1%N tl)
union_s0d_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (s0 s1 : state) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (M2 prec_list s0 s1) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) (app 0%N tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 0%N pl (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (app 0%N tl)
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
union_s1d_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
union_s0d_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (pl pl0 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tl)
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)

```  
intros s a p d H1 H2.
unfold union_mpl_0.
destruct s.
- assumption.
- destruct (N.eqb a0 a) eqn:E.
  + apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H1 as [H1s H1t].
    apply H1s.
  + apply MapMerge_correct.
    * apply H1.
    * apply H2.
```

original: intros s a p d H1 H2. unfold union_mpl_0. destruct s. - auto. - destruct (N.eqb a0 a) eqn:E. + apply state_ref_ok_M2_destr in H1 as [H1s H1t]. apply H1s. + apply MapMerge_correct. * apply H1. * apply H2.
